description: Balanced Armature in-ear headphones with full range driver, woofer and tweeter tremendously broadenthe spectrum of sound. Conveniently control an iPod, iPad or iPhone with the in-line remote and built-in mic.<br>Sporting three specialized Sony Balanced Armature driver units-a full-range driver, woofer and tweeter-slip into a dramatic, full-bodiedsoundscape of sublimely soaring highs and profound lows. Engineered especially for audiophiles and music lovers alike, rediscover every note of your favorite songs delivered with remarkable balance, richness and clarity. Plus, a convenient in-line remote with built-in mic means you can control yourcompatible iPhone, iPod or iPad for easy listening and hands-free calls.<br>
title: Sony XBA-3IP - 3 Drivers Balanced Armature In-Ear Headphones for Apple
